description.raw:
I have seen the following error messages lately:
~~~
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:390] Unable to parse model.config for model[http://gazebosim.org/models/calibration_plane]
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:390] Unable to parse model.config for model[http://gazebosim.org/models/checkerboard_plane]
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:390] Unable to parse model.config for model[http://gazebosim.org/models/spectrum_plane]
~~~

The errors occur  when TiXml fails to parse the config files with multi-line description fields. It may fail to read the files [here](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/1054201b80f7768d4f163a73df137a7ecc9e2e3e/gazebo/common/ModelDatabase.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ModelDatabase.cc-373) but succeed [in sdformat](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/src/06eff281aba7a67a75f046578b925e3ca57ef4bc/src/parser.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#parser.cc-594) because ModelDatabase.cc uses `Parse(string)` while sdformat's parser.cc uses `LoadFile(path)`.

This pull request removes the errors by converting the multi-line descriptions into single lines.
description.html:
I have seen the following error messages lately:

[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:390] Unable to parse model.config for model[http://gazebosim.org/models/calibration_plane]
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:390] Unable to parse model.config for model[http://gazebosim.org/models/checkerboard_plane]
[Err] [ModelDatabase.cc:390] Unable to parse model.config for model[http://gazebosim.org/models/spectrum_plane]

The errors occur when TiXml fails to parse the config files with multi-line description fields. It may fail to read the files here but succeed in sdformat because ModelDatabase.cc uses Parse(string) while sdformat's parser.cc uses LoadFile(path).

This pull request removes the errors by converting the multi-line descriptions into single lines.

title: Unable to parse model.config
